website_summaries.verdict: You'll pay a bit more for this mattress pad, but satisfied customers agree that the added expense is worth it for such a high-quality product.
pros: Distances itself from customers with a durable and very comfortable hypoallergenic down alternative material
cons: On the more expensive end, but you are paying for high quality

customer_reviews.title: Ripped immediately when washed - Update: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My first pad ripped immediately upon washing, but we slept on it anyway and it was great. The company offered a replacement, but we didn't see the point at the time. Out of the blue, the company just contacted us again to let us know that they had improved the materials, and asked if we wanted a replacement. Great customer service, and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh there is a reason people pay for higher quality mattress covers and now I know why. I’ve been sleeping on cheap ones with expensive mattresses for years. And, whoa, do I feel like a fool. If you want to take your mattress to the next level, invest a high quality mattress cover like this one. It adds just the right amount of softened and comfort while still allowing you to be cool and/or toasty all night. Best purchase I’ve made in a long long time!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Crispy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of this mattress cover before I bought it and saw that others had problems with it tearing in the washing machine. I bought it anyways because according to those reviews it sounded like the manufacturer fixed the issue and it was made of a sturdier material now. I just washed mine for the first time and it came out destroyed. A real bummer because when it was on my bed it was really comfortable and kept my mattress feeling cooler. Very dissatisfied with the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this topper for COOLING and it works ..
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing topper .The main reason I bought this was for the cooling effects .We have a memory foam Mattress and have been so frustrated by how much heat it retains at night.We tried everything including changing our thermostat,having all the A/C vents cleaned ,bought lighter bedding's and also tried a few 'gel' toppers but nothing seemed to work .I have had this topper about a month now and it works as advertised .I have not woken up at night due to heat since we got this topper .It is very thin and may not really change the characteristic/softness of your mattress but it definitely makes the bed cooler at night.Highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Mulamba

customer_reviews.title: I really love this mattress pad butt 😤😤
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mattress pad, it is nice and thick. My only complaint is the cheap backing on the pad. If the pad slides down on your bed and you grab the pad to pull it back up it will and does rip. Rips like paper. 😕😕Very very cheap backing, you make a great mattress pad put a decent quality backing on it. 3 stars because of cheap backing. Ok only been a year and a half and the mattress pad is pretty much trash now because the backing has all ripped off ☹😤☹😤.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Berns

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is very soft and comfort to sleep on it. However, right after I received it, I wash it right away so that I can use it. I did not check every inch of the pad. But after I put it out from the washer, I found a small part near the edge was torn, the thread was broken and some dark grey cotton was inside. I washed it in warm and cold water. So, I can only give one star for this very expensive pad.
customer_reviews.author: Ah Fai

customer_reviews.title: Hot Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: I am going through menopause and I am looking for anything to keep me cool. When I first get into bed the mattress pad is cool. But when I wake up sweating, instead of having a cool bed, it feels like I am sleeping on a heating pad: furnace inside and out. I wanted to get up and pull off the mattress pad right then and there. Then I thought I'd give it more time. Perhaps I was just having a couple of really bad night. I gave it a lot of chances and I just can't have it on the bed. Drats!
customer_reviews.author: rileybug

customer_reviews.title: Had this for just under two months. Pulled it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for just under two months. Pulled it off today to shake it out and discovered is was coming apart on the underside. Will contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Revell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this in April 2017 loved the feel it gave the mattress. Washed on gentle cycle took out of washer and it is falling apart. Will have to go buy one before using the bed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J C.

customer_reviews.title: My first pain free nights sleep in MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: We got a new mattress, and for months I’ve felt like I‘d been beat up when I woke up. Plus it’s a memory foam “cooling” hybrid but I often felt too warm. When this arrived I had serious doubts that It would make that big of a difference. I was wrong. I’ve slept on it for two nights. I woke up feeling better than usual the first morning, but today I woke up pain free and I’m so grateful. I don’t know or care how, but this transformed our bed into easily the most comfortable I’ve ever slept on, and no more overheating either! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Anthony Boyles

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing cooling about this mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress pad for over a week and wanted to really like it, but it seems to make my mattress very hot. There's nothing cooling about this. On the contrary, my mattress is hotter than before using this. I can't comment on the plushness as I didn't have any issues with a firm mattress to begin with. I can say that the lining used on the back is much heavier and seems like it'll stand up to multiple washes. It's much thicker than most mattress covers, but I bought it for the sole purpose of its "cooling" effects and it didn't deliver on this.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: No different than our regular mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress pad for it's "cooling" aspect. My husband gets extremely hot at night so I was excited to try this bamboo mattress pad. We tried it and honestly, couldn't tell any difference. The fabric has a nice feel & the bed skirt fit our deep mattress well, but it didn't keep us any cooler than our regular mattress pad. I was really hoping this would help. Sadly, I'll be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: As an old nurse, this is the most excellent mattress cover I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is soft and thick and cushions all the pressure points. I just purchased my third cover and others have remained soft and comfortable for many months. I have had no problems whatsoever with this product and highly recommend it to anyone needing a soft place to sleep. I even received a thank you note from the company, and I understand this company is owned by a veteran and covers are made in the USA---all good points to keep in mind when buying a product online.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stuffing falls out.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it in the beginning. It was very comfortable and breathable. Unfortunately it fell apart after five months of using it. I only washed it one time in that period of time and the bottom material that held the stuffing in began to deteriorate immediately. Very disappointing considering the price. I kept using it but the stuffing continue to fall out. I have pictures of five different areas where the batting is coming out. The underneath material is deteriorating/dissolving. I can't post the pictures for some tech reason.
customer_reviews.author: christine c. wood

customer_reviews.title: Horrible off-gassing, arrived cheaply packaged!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the twin XL for my king sized Sleep Number bed. The web description says machine washable, which you would expect for a mattress cover. What I received was an item packaged in sealed plastic, and when opened, gave off the WORSE off-gas smell! The elastic that goes around the mattress looks really flimsy and cheap. Instructions say to wash in a washing machine WITHOUT a center agitator and 'May be dry cleaned'. WHAT?!! I spend all this money for this mattress pad and they dictate the type of washer I wash it in? And suggest dry cleaning?? WHY WAS THIS NOT LISTED IN THE DETAILS OF THE DESCRIPTION? Would NEVER have purchased this, had I known!
customer_reviews.author: GDB

customer_reviews.title: I’m still burning up on my foam mattress:-(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it would help with how hot my foam mattress sleeps. Well let’s just say I still wake up feeling that whatever side of my body that is facing the mattress feels like it’s on fire. There’s got to be a better option out there somewhere, but I blew my wad on this and now I can’t afford another option. If you’re going for foam mattress temperature control keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical what just a cover could do but was initially pretty impressed. I'm not sure if i've just gotten used to its magic powers or that it really has became flatter, but it doesn't seem as great as day one. It kind of lumps up on the sides and flattens in the middle. I took it off and fluffed it a little and it seems to have improved. I'm only about 135lbs so I (hope) *I* am not the cause of its flattening. Update: Don't wash in anything other than the triple (or larger) washers in the dry cleaners! I tried to wash mine in our oversized washer and it ripped it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but after 6 months it has ripped in about 6 places. The top layer of material almost seems brittle, I don't understand why they used it. It did help my bed become more comfortable, and it's never hot, so that's all as advertised. I'm very disappointed that I'll have to purchase another one soon since this is rapidly falling apart. Happy to provide pictures if asked! Edit** the company stands behind their product and mended this situation. Always nice to work with a good company!
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Hotter than a thinner pad.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mattress pad that would cool me off a bit while sleeping, when I found this Bamboo Mattress Pad. In looking at the product description and some reviews, I thought this might finally be something that does the job. Unfortunately, this has not been the case. In fact, not only does this pad not cool me off, it actually has made me sweat every night since I've owned it...hence my plan to return it today. If you're looking for a pad that allows for a cooler sleep, and unless you're comparing it to a feather bed or some other hot layer, this is NOT the pad for you.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Walker

customer_reviews.title: BEST, MOST PLUSH MATTRESS PAD EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this product for about 6 months. It is without a doubt the MOST PLUSH mattress pad we have EVER owned. It is amazing, AND, I'm a large person and this holds it's shape and fluff. I'm getting ready to order another one just so when this one wears out, I've got one. It's so huge I cannot wash it in a home washer. I wash it in the laundromat in a tub that says "7 loads," equivalent.....This can make a board feel comfortable! I just can't say enough positive about this..
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O

customer_reviews.title: I'm able to sleep without overheating
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple of weeks and I'm so happy I bought this mattress pad. Once the weather heated up I was awake multiple times a night due to being very hot and could feel the hot spot on my old mattress pad. I bought this with the hope of a more comfortable nights sleep and have not been disappointed. It did take a few days, I think the pad needs a little time to fully fluff back up. Once it did, I was able to sleep comfortably again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our king-sized bed a year ago and have been unbelievably happy with it. So much so that when it came time to replace the pad on the Cal King bed at our vacation condo, we ordered the exact same one. We do not feel hot when sleeping on this pad! It's comfortable, fits right, and offers just the right amount of softness. It may be a little more expensive than some of the others offered on Amazon, but you get what you pay for! Grab this pad, your body will thank you for it!
customer_reviews.author: Bado

customer_reviews.title: and a cool gel pillow which also helps
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress cover for 4 months now and it is still soft and cushy and does add an extra layer of comfort to our mattress. I primarily bought this to serve as an extra layer of coolness from the bamboo. I have severe hot flashes from menopause and this cover truly helps keep my bed linens cooler than before. Granted I also use bamboo blend sheets, and a cool gel pillow which helps as well. My sheets tend to slip upwards, every few days, but I just pull them back down in the corners as necessary; still worth it! I do recommend this mattress pad!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling at all....actually creates more heat
customer_reviews.text: So bummed. I bought this because it claimed it was cooling. That is not the case at all. Would return it if we could but of course it has been used now. Very frustrated and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Shredded in washer on gentle cycle
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Upon reading my review eLuxury contacted me and refunded my purchase. They also told me they've changed the fabrication so this will not happen in the future. I definitely plan on buying a mattress topped from them next time I need one. ----------------------------------------------------------- I bought my mattress topper 1.5 years ago. I recently washed it in a large machine on gentle cycle. I was shocked to pull it from the washer and have it totally shredded. My machine does not have an oscillation center piece so I have zero idea how it tore and shredded. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: fa

customer_reviews.title: finally sleeping through my night!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - incredibly soft and comfortable - fits a mattress and two inch foam topper underneath - came in perfect condition and nice packaging Cons: - can't ever wash this! if you buy this, I would already accept the fact it should never go into a washing machine. I don't know why, but there are too many reviewers that have had this experience. maybe also write it on the tag in case someone forgets. Spot clean with a hot wash cloth. And just gently dab, don't scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress pad a little over a year ago and I'm very disappointed. I've never spent this much on a mattress pad before but decided to splurge as an anniversary gift for my husband and I. I don't wash it very often so that's not why it's falling apart. The fabric on the back was so thin and fragile that it is coming apart and the stuffing is falling out. I've never had a cheap mattress pad do that. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy V. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Although this pad is very comfortable, there is a design flaw in the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this pad is very comfortable, there is a design flaw in the back lining. It tears as easy as paper! Our first one tore in several places. They conveniently sent us a new one, but the same thing happened again. There is now way to wash it now, as the stuffing is coming out. Would not recommend if you shift positions a lot when you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 3 washes - But then replaced by company customer service
customer_reviews.text: After washing the mattress pad maybe 3 times the bottom material has come apart allowing the stuffing to come out. The pad lasted 14 months. I was contacted by eLuxury Supply and they promptly corrected the issue by supplying me with a new replacement free of charge. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in the wash (however replaced with a better pad by the company)
customer_reviews.text: Update: I'm changing our review from a one start to a four star because of the amazing customer service and replacement of mattress pad with a new updated pad. Their customer service was incredible and very willing to help. We washed this thing and it fell apart. The back is made of that cheap paper material. It shredded in the washing machine and the stuffing fell out everywhere. For as much as this thing cost, I should have been able to wash it without it falling apart. Comfortable to sleep on, but that’s the only good thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but doesn't last. Can't contact the seller. Can't return it! Unhappy! VERY UNHAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mattress topper when I received it in July of 2015. I wasn't concerned about disliking it after a period of time since the warranty said 100 percent money back, now questions asked. Now, less than 1 year later, the stretch fabric on the sides is beginning to shred! I have washed it only on gentle. The shredding didn't happen in the wash machine. I was taking it off to wash it and noticed it a few days ago. Now I can't return it! It is comfortable. Just wish it had lasted. I am not happy and can find no way to contact the seller!
customer_reviews.author: bc60

customer_reviews.title: NOT THICK ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased, I was searching for a mattress topper that would bring comfort, fluffiness, and leave my back feeling better in the mornings; I returned the mattress topper 2 nights later. I felt it wasn’t thick enough, and didn’t seem like a drastic comfort change for me. For the price, it wasn’t for me; I am glad their return policy is flexible. I just wish they had a thicker mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: Matcha_Matcha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am super hot natured and got this in hopes I wouldn’t be so hot at night.. our mattress is a popular brand that is known for holding heat. With the positive reviews, I thought this would be a great product to try. I was wrong... while it is okay as far as comfort goes, it does not cool down our bed at all. I really feel like we wasted our money. I tried to give it a fair shot, but it’s really disappointed us after a couple of months of use. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yarbroughs

customer_reviews.title: Its very plush!
customer_reviews.text: I received this two days ago, and have slept on it twice. It's very plush, and makes a big difference in my matress's comfort. It installed just like a fitted sheet, only easier, and my fitted sheet went right over the top fine. Because I have an adjustable bed, and a memory foam mattress I use sheet fasteners to hold the sheet in place. They hold everything perfectly.  I still havent had a really warm night to test how it disperses body heat, which is the primary reason for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kuenster

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked this cover, I was immediately concerned because the fitted skirt looks cheap. Surprisingly it is incredibly durable (it can withstand being ripped off roughly during bedding changes and the crazy antics of my pup). The cover is comfortable, and (while not perfect) really helps with temperature control on my rather-warm foam mattress. I have not spilt anything on it since purchasing several months ago so I cannot speak to the water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upone 1st wash
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! After conducting much research, last week I purchased a new mattress and this king mattress pad. I followed the machine wash instructions explicitly and washed it on gentle cycle, cold water, and a small amt of woolite. I have HE, xl, top load washer with no aggitator. When the wash cycle was complete, I opened the top and the mattress pad was completely torn and there were 2 spots of brown discoloration. The wash instructions also say dry clean but who is going to take their mattress pad to the dry cleaner? I was mine frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY penny!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is worth every penny! We have had it for a week now and have had better sleep this past week than in several years. We recently moved so we have been putting off getting a new mattress but 1) with this pad it is not as urgent and 2) when we get our new, king bed- we will be getting a Bamboo Mattress Pad for that bed too! We have bamboo sheets so getting the mattress pad in bamboo was perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Went in skeptical, came out very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased too many different blankets, liners, duvet covers, etc. over the past several years to help me with night sweats. I'm on a Casper mattress and had a Sealy 3" foam topper (yep, I know that's part of the problem) that allegedly has something in it to offset heat. I put this pad on top of the foam topper with a regular mattress liner around it and the Bamboo on top of it. So, I separated myself from the foam and augmented it with this pad. The combination of the two has reduced my night sweats by probably 90% over the past few weeks. The Bamboo topper is very, very comfortable and I've slept much better. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Conley

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra cushion (and lots of heat)
customer_reviews.text: This topper was great at providing extra cushion for a much too firm matress, but it was extremely HOT. I run warm at night so I researched toppers that wouldn't be too hot. This one came up as not being too hot and it had great reviews. I had to take it off the bed after a couple of days because the heat was too much for me. I will not be using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't Last Long!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years this mattress cover tore apart and the stuffing was a big mess. The fabric just completely disintegrated, like washing Kleenex in a machine! Until that happened it was great, but only 3 years usage? Not good.
customer_reviews.author: mysterylover

customer_reviews.title: Substantial mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Its been a while since I've purchased a mattress pad for our bed and I decided to spend a little more to get a good one. I'm happy to have found one made in the USA, and its amazing! It's on the heavy side and substantial. We have a king size memory foam mattress and this provides a perfect top layer of protection and softness. My only concern is that when it's time to wash it I'll have to take it somewhere as it will not fit in my home washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: BarbW

customer_reviews.title: Oh so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering this item due to the price, but, when I got the pad on my bed it was instant confirmation of a great choice. Since that first night I have washed the mattress pad a couple of times and it is like brand new all over again. This takes an a already good bed to being a really great bed. Believe me, you will feel the difference. I am happy I upgraded to this mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Saving Face

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Contacted the company when the item first arrived and voiced concern at the quality of the product and was assured it would hold up well! Not so! Took it off the bed to day to wash and the whole middle section of seams have come apart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this in a king June 2018, a little over a year ago. I did notice that the elastic fitted part of the sheet can/did tear but it wasn't enough to complain. Since then I got a Great Dane puppy. She likes to dig to make a spot comfortable. Well, before I was able to put on clean sheets she needed to get comfortable. By no fault of the manufacturer, the cover got shredded. So, here I am happily making another purchase. I'm glad the previous purchase was in my history so I didn't have to conduct my usual research!
customer_reviews.author: bdad08

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter normally needs to sleep on a cool mattress. She is pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We are using this bamboo mattress pad on a brand new hybrid mattress for our daughter. It arrived on time. The mattress pad came in an appropriate package. It seems well made and it stays in place on the mattress when you use it. Our daughter normally needs to sleep on a cool mattress. She is pleased with it. It arrived a week an 1/2, This is why we gave it 4 stars. As of now we are all pleased with our purchase and will recommend it to our friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Deloire

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new mattress that was a little too firm. I thought I would just have to live with it. Someone recommended that I try this mattress pad and I have to admit I was a bit skeptical as it is made out of bamboo. Wow! What a great mattress pad that makes a firm mattress very comfy. I was so impressed I bought another bamboo mattress pad for my guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jean Pickus

customer_reviews.title: Too firm and makes weird crunching noise
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked the feel of this pad, it was spongey, but after sleeping on it a few days I don't like it as much anymore. I have been waking up with stiffness in my back, arms, and legs and I noticed it was making a weird plastic-crunching sound which I wasn't too fond of. The search for a comfortable topper continues.
customer_reviews.author: Carli D.

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad was not as comfortable as I thought it would be. Not thick at all, and my husband and I both ran hot within the first night of use. I purchased due to the claim of cooling properties. I would not repurchase, and may just give in to a gel foam topper (even though I very much dislike foam). It did make our mattress a touch softer, as I don’t care for firm, but my husband does. Overall, I’d look at other options...
customer_reviews.author: LR507

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this mattress topper. We have an older foam mattress, from before they came with cooling gel, that is a little on the firmer side. My husband would also complain about getting too hot on the mattress. With this topper, our bed is softer, but not too soft and is cooler. We both get much better sleep. Just to note: it does not fit into our washer and dryer (we have a queen size bed), so we need to take it to the laundromat. For us, this topper is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cool & comfy sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best mattress pad I have ever purchased. I live in Hawai'i, & the current night time temperatures can range from 77-80 degrees. I only use a fan at night, & this mattress pad has made a huge difference as I am able to sleep more comfortably at night. I would definitely recommend this to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cooling and comfortable! After trying several toppers, we bought one of these for our queen bed a couple years ago. After the initial break-in period, the topper got quiet and soft, but not too soft. I would say it's just right in softness and loft. We were so pleased with it that we recently purchased another to fit our new king bed. It definitely cools better than any other option I've tried, including gel foam and copper infused latex. While it's probably not the end-all for mattress woes, it certainly helped me.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed this product while it was in my bed
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this product while it was in my bed. When I washed it according to the directs on the tag, it complete fell apart. This was a huge waste of money. Do not buy this. You cannot wash it.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Definetelly not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product hoping I would have a cooler night of sleep. I was totally wrong. It doesn’t keep you cooler or helps you not to get too hot. Have woken up multiple nights soaked wet. The price is extremely high for the product. Will be returning the product. Again, if you are too hot and are thinking to buy this to help you , DO NOT DO IT. What a waste of money. Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Third purchase, still in ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is our third purchase of this brand of mattress pad. It is not the least expensive but it is the BEST! If you happen to want certain things in a mattress pad to ensure good sleep, this is the pad for you. We read the reviews (and have not laundered any of our pads....so no comment on durability in washing machine) and love the hypoallergenic properties and loft and coolness.
customer_reviews.author: L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but a little mobile
customer_reviews.text: We put this over the memory foam topper we bought to try and prevent me from sleeping so hot. Also bought some "cool sleeping" sheets. The cool memory foam and the sheets didn't help. But this topper did make some different. My only complaint is it moves around a little and has to be stretched back in place pretty regularly. But thats more of a nit pick than a real complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Terry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new Tempurpedic mattress. It was supposed to be much cooler than my older one, but it isn't as cool as it was in the store. After reading about this bamboo mattress pad, I decided to see if it would help. Its fantastic! I haven't had a bad night since and we are having a real warm spell here in Georgia. It has met all of its claims and more. No more slow roasting during the night!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally! I am able to sleep through the night without waking up sweating and hot.
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I am able to sleep through the night without waking up sweating and hot. It doesnt make you cold so that is good for my husband. We were concerned that it would be more cooling and he would freeze at night. But it is just perfect. I didnt wash it because I read the reviews that said it would fall apart. It add alot of thickness to the mattress and it is so comfortable. So if you are looking for a new mattress pad to not only add comfort but also keep you from waking up at night feeling like your back is on fire, this is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: T Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick & Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product reviewed on BuzzFeed. I had been thinking for about a year that it was time for a new mattress pad, so the timing was perfect. I was initially drawn to the “cooling” property of the bamboo, but didn’t realize how thick and well-made the mattress pad would be. My old mattress pad was quite thin and easily slipped around. This pad is staying put - you can tell right away - and adds a nice cushion on top of the mattress. (Since I just purchased this, I can’t speak to the ability to clean.) I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress cover on the bed for about 3 weeks now. It is indeed soft and fluffy, and comfortable. The problem is 1) that it to thick for any but one set of my sheets to fit over, and 2) for some reason both those sheets and the mattress cover itself have a tendency to slide around just enough to make it impossible to make the bedding bunch up - and that is NOT comfortable. Disappointing. May have to remove and not use the mattress cover to try a different type.
customer_reviews.author: Stylishwithbunions

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought online in forever. If you want to feel like you're jumping into a cloud of heaven buy this! Although it fits easily on a queen-size bed, the fluffy parts on the top of the pad move around a bit if you shift on the bed. Also it makes your sheets fit a little tighter than you might like and I don't think they make sheets any deeper than I have.
customer_reviews.author: PattiB

customer_reviews.title: return..please..I need a waiver to return this item..
customer_reviews.text: great pad I need to send this back.., I got this pad for my guest bed so when my brother arrived from Boise to die he would be comfortable.....he passed April 24th, so with all going on I did not take time to return it..I did order a queen size and plan to keep, it.. so can I get a waver to return this.. please email me.. at kathleenhanley7777@gmail.com 775 560-1751..
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN HANLEY

customer_reviews.title: Instantly provides an extra layer of cushy comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad/topper is wonderful! It is lightweight and was easy to place over our mattress. It adds a welcome layer of soft cushioning that contributes to a better night's sleep. It is not for someone who prefers a firm surface. So far, it is resilient. The quilting maintains an evenly padded surface. It had no initial odor like some mattress toppers. Although the weather has not yet been very hot, it seems like this bamboo mattress pad doesn't generate heat. It seems like it will provide a cooler night's sleep during warm weather. We also appreciate that it is made in the USA and sold by veteran owned company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me a lot cooler!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Tempur-pedic mattress which retains heat. A great feature when we purchased the mattress but not so great now as a soon to be 50 year young lady! This mattress pad has helped! I still sleep with my bedside fan on but I can feel a difference for sure! I am also happy with the overall feel with the pad. Soft and luxurious. Worth the cost to me!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Smith

customer_reviews.title: ExceptionalSheets Rayon From Bamboo Mattress  - Extra Plush Cooling Topper
customer_reviews.text: We have a Tempurpedic mattress. While we like the mattress quality and firmness, we have found it to be VERY hot. I bought a cooling gel foam topper a few years ago and it just did not do the trick. A few nights with the Exceptional Sheets Cooling Topper and I have noticed a difference in heat retention. I stay much cooler while I am sleeping. My husband loves the plushness of the topper too, as he found the Tempurpedic too firm for his liking. So far I am impressed with the quality and function of the topper.
customer_reviews.author: MMArdo

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable cooling effect on our memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad itself seems to be of very high quality. But we chose it specifically for the claimed cooling properties... and in our opinion it did not deliver on this promise. We used it for two (hot, late-summer) nights on our memory foam mattress, and we still felt just as hot and smothered from below as we had felt before adding the pad, perhaps even a little more. Sad and disappointed, and still hot, we are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Schiff

customer_reviews.title: Cooling, heavenly comfort, and no chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress topper now for 6.5 months, and am happy to report it continues to hold up well. It made a hard organic futon that was making me sore into a very comfortable firm bed. Upon unpacking, there was no chemical smell, and the product is clearly well made, neatly stitched. I did not wash it, so do not have the experience like many others of any rips. It is cooling while plush yet firm, and no dents or loss of shape, yet. At last, I can sleep! What a service to humanity to make something like this! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cating

customer_reviews.title: This pad is extremely comfortable and soft BUT as others have noted there are ...
customer_reviews.text: This pad is extremely comfortable and soft BUT as others have noted there are issues with stiching coming apart after 1 wash. Stiching in the boxes coming out and 2 corners have opened up leaving filling exposed. FYI hard to fit in even larger capacity front loading washers. Note - I washed it in a commercial machine so that is not the issue of why it's coming apart. Need to fix the coming apart issues since it's not worth the money as is....unless you change your mattress pads very frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Caisse

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress topper a few years ago and immediately upon first wash noticed stuffing coming out (despite following wash instructions). I tried writing a product review about this but received no follow-up from the company. I'm about to throw it away due to the flimsiness (despite the fact that it's soft and I've made due). I'd really like to give this company another chance, as the material is cool and soft, but I'm afraid to spend my money on something that will fall apart again. I would say that until this company improves their product/customer service, I hope others don't purchase the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for side sleepers.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cross between memory foam, which is too soft, and a regular mattress pad. I'm a side sleeper that gets shoulder and hip pain. this seems to have done the trick and I'm very happy with it. Appreciate all the people who took the time but the reviews on here since that's the advice I followed. I use two pillows and that gets my neck and spine lined up.
customer_reviews.author: mark d cotterman

customer_reviews.title: A great night's sleep, the sheets fit well over it, and it washes well
customer_reviews.text: The best mattress pad we've ever had. At first I thought that, because the pad has a high loft, our fitted sheets might have a problem – no problem at all. It washes well, and it keeps its loft. I bought this pad in other sizes for our Aerobeds, which may be used for days or weeks, and they fit as perfectly as they do on our king-size bed (one that can be raised up by remote control at either end). We have enough room in our apartment closets to store the other sizes – they are bulky. The price gave me pause, but this pad is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: twigs

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER mattress cover of all time!
customer_reviews.text: BEST EVER mattress cover! Helps me sleep at night! Sooooo comfortable. WOW! Everybody needs one. And it keeps the sheets on much better than the generic brand we had. Save your money on a new mattress, get this cover first, seriously! Never thought a mattress cover would make such a difference! And it's made in USA! Hurray for America!! 😀😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pino

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this bamboo pad! Most impressive is that it actually FIT ENTIRELY around my huge, queen, gel-pad-tempura-topped mattress! Combining this pad together with my new bamboo sheet set from Oasis Fine Linens Island Bamboo Collection, and I get the most HEAVENLY sleep without having to pay for a 5-star hotel! Between my gel-topped mattress, this bamboo pad plus the bamboo sheets, my heated, sweat-filled nights are no longer. (Drop the dirty thoughts, I'm talking menopause here.) I am very happy with this pad and highly recommend it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Prie

customer_reviews.title: Already 3 years of cool sleeping on this cover
customer_reviews.text: After buying a foam mattress I was feeling hot in my sleep so I went for this cover to cool down my nights and I have to say this is an amazing cover, definitely sleep better and don’t have the heat feeling anymore, and the little plush it gives on top of my extra firm mattress is perfect. I have it for 3 years now and still looks like new. Yes it’s expensive but worth every penny in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mike BK

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Buffers Heat From My Mattress, & Wortth The Money
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and comfortable, and it stays in place on the bed. A review I read said it was bigger than the bed, but for me it was exactly the right size or just a cm smaller on the edges, which isn't a big deal. I have a latex mattress, which like memory foam, can get very warm. This mattress topper helped buffer that. I don't feel the heat from my mattress like I used to, and I'm so thankful for that! I didn't notice much of a smell to it; maybe just a slight new smell.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made backing to the pad
customer_reviews.text: Backing to the pad ripped very easily and all the stuff came lot. I would not buy this again. Very disappointed! Owned this less then a year. ****update 1/29/18**** Company contacted me (offered to replace pad, i had already boughy a new one) and refunded my money. Although disappointed with the product, excellent customer service. Company stated they are using new material on backing now.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I find this mattress pad to be of good quality and well made. I would say that it is 1.5-2 inches thick. It does not seem to hold heat. The sheets don't slide around it. It holds well to the mattress due to nice thick elastic skirt to hold it in place. My mattress is 17" thick and I have a waterproof mattress pad underneath that is about 0.5 inch thick. I have had no reason to wash it so I can not attest to how well it holds up. I have no problem recommending this mattress pad to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Motte

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this matress pad a little over a month and am extremely satisfied with it. I have a pillow top matress that is a bit warm to sleep on. This pad really cools it down. The material seems sturdier than other pads I’ve used; however, I will probably put it on a “hand wash” cycle and “air” dry to preserve it. Even if it doesn’t cool enough for you, it is a very comfortable matress pad. Before buying a whole new mattress, I would definitely suggest you give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: skgeralds

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful feeling, except it does not help with a memory foam mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Really soft, but the reason I bought it was in hope of sleeping cooler on my stupid, excessively hot, over priced, 200 pound memory foam mattress. This wasn't the answer I sought. I'm sure it will feel amazing when I can afford a new mattress that doesn't make me feel like I'm being swallowed into a baking loaf of bread!
customer_reviews.author: Tiggsy

customer_reviews.title: If you are cold all the time or want to use this during the winter I am sure it would be a great cover. However
customer_reviews.text: If you advertise this mattress pad will keep you cooler you should probably sleep on it to see if your statement is true. This thing was so hot we returned it within 3 nights of sleeping on it. If you are cold all the time or want to use this during the winter I am sure it would be a great cover. However, not a good cover for warm nights.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: It started coming apart after a couple of years, hopefully improvements have been made
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice looking and Comfortable mattress protector. But after a couple of years it started splitting and tearing on the liner part. Not sure how long they are supposed to last but if all I can get is two years I will just go with a cheaper one so its not so expensive to replace. All of the features would be five star, but use full lifespan maybe 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W. Gantt

customer_reviews.title: My lower back says thank you.....
customer_reviews.text: I have herniated disks in my lower back. A relative told me to try a mattress topper. I have a "topper" mattress but adding this pad has helped immensely! And, NO smell when I took it out of the zippered plastic bag. Also, a handwritten thank you note on the car inside of the bag. Nice touch. This topper is truly PLUS and extremely well made. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: waterlily

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep us cooler at night over the top of a memory foam mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the Mattress pad two nights and I love it so far! I will change reviews if necessary, but right now it was a great purchase! We bought this pad because we were getting hot on our memory foam mattress. This looked thick enough to allow some air ventilation between us and our mattress so I went for the purchase. So far I am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress cover!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this item for my queen bed back in 2017. I had it for 2 years and loved it! (It did shed a little with some of the stuffing, but manageable). When I upgraded to a Cali King, I knew I had to have the same mattress pad. It's very comfortable and soft. It also looks like they tried to remedy the shedding aspect too with a more durable underside.
customer_reviews.author: Staples

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: If I was rating this on comfort - it would be a 4. However I bought this as it was advertised as a cooling topper and it did the exact opposite for me. From the second I got into bed it started heating up and increased in heat all through the night. I received it yesterday and I'm returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a queen mattress pad and so happy with it ordered a TwinXL for another bed in our home. Total comfort and the quality is there, great fit, ultra comfort. Doesn't shift on Tempurpedic beds. In effort to support U.S. manufacturers was most happy to find eLuxury, bonus company run by a veteran. Definitely telling friends about eLuxury and thank you for a stellar product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: not as cooling as I'd anticipated, but decent
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mattress topper to mitigate the heat-trapping characteristics of my memory foam mattress, and this one got high marks from a number of sources. It helps a little, not a lot, but it is very comfortable and doesn't take away from what I love about my memory foam mattress. So, it's a nice topper, but not nearly as cooling as I'd been led to believe.
customer_reviews.author: techwriter

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Thick, soft and really changes how our bed feels. Seems to be quality material, heavy feeling. Fits a thick mattress with ease. We tried other highly rated mattress pads on Amazon and returned them, without question, none of them compare to this one!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress topper, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress topper to increase the comfort of a very firm foam mattress. It works well for that purpose. It is thick and soft and has a nice bamboo fabric cover which seems cool and comfortable. The only negative is the tendency to develop body impressions which don't really affect comfort but can be unsightly. Washing and tumble drying the topper at a commercial laundry did return it to new condition but the body impressions soon returned. I would like to see the topper somehow resist body impressions better. Then, this would be a five star product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RICKVOO

customer_reviews.title: Lining was torn off after 2 washing.
customer_reviews.text: The lining of this pad is not a cotton or poly fabric. It’s some sort of paper like poly material or mesh. I been meaning to write a review for a long time......we had to replace this after 1 year.....only 2 washings on delicate Cycle, and dried on the line outside. Too expensive for quality.
customer_reviews.author: discerning shopper

customer_reviews.title: This mattress protector is extremely comfortable, awesome seller.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is extremely comfortable. It honestly does feel like sleeping on a cloud but does not have that saggy feel with thicker pads. I installed it and used it for 4 months and had some trouble with the backing material. The seller reached out to me and offered a replacement, free of charge. They have also changed the backing material to make it more durable. The product is awesome and so is the seller.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortsble
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is great. Its huge so couldnt get it in my front load washer and get the door closed, so will have to dry clean. I sprayed with lysol and took outside in sun. It fluffed up nicely and fits the king temperpedic mattress great. Its also very cool to sleep, doesnt hold heat.
customer_reviews.author: akirkelie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this mattress topper. It softens the surface of my mattress & has helped reduce night sweats and achy bones. I often have to shift positions through out the night to get comfortable but with this topper I can remain in one position for longer periods without pain waking me and thus I'm getting better quality sleep! I haven't needed to wash it yet so cannot comment on how it will hold up but it seems well constructed
customer_reviews.author: S. Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this mattress topper again immediately if something happened to the one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my mattress I was assured they had changed over the years I would not retain heat. The mattress manufacturer and sales person was not honest, it caused my husband and I many nights of grief by retaining heat. I purchased this mattress cover but it’s reviews and was not disappointed. It is very soft and fits the mattress wonderful. It has helped to dissipate most of the heat
customer_reviews.author: Jmo321

customer_reviews.title: A Cloud In A Box
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper greatly exceeded my expectations. It is so soft! And it doesn't get hot at all! In fact, my sleep has improved 10x since I bought it. I no longer have migraines, and I wake up with tons of energy (although this makes my bed so comfortable I never want to get up). I wouldn't risk putting it into the washer given it's size. (I'm also extremely attached to it now, so I'll probably splurge on dry cleaning). Although, if you had a very large front load washer or one without a center pillar it would probably fit. Expectation Reality ^ ^ <---|--------------------------------------------------------------------|------->
customer_reviews.author: CollegeDormLife

customer_reviews.title: Bed went from OK to Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress pad I've ever purchased. Left it out of the package for a day so that the fibers could fully expand. It was hard to wait, but so worth it. This mattress pad changed my bed from OK to Wonderful. What a difference it makes to sleep on a bed that feels luxurious. I will buy one for every bed in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Am satisfied with the topper, but was worried about the durability after washing & drying of this item that several ‘reviewers’ have mentioned. We purchased this topper because our new mattress was a bit-to firm & somewhat ‘heat generating’ then we like. This was the solution ! Even though it was one of the least expensive ones —-it had the highest ratings on amazon—both my wife & me agree as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Gets WARM
customer_reviews.text: Although it is described as "cooler" I find it gets WARM, borderline hot after few hours. It feels nice and comfy when you first lay down on it, but after few hours it gets uncomfortable and seem to get flatten a bit. It is better than other memory foam I purchased, but still I cannot sleep thru the night.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how much I needed an extra couple inches of cloud on top of my bed till the first time I slept on this. Got it because my bed got too hot at night, and was hoping it would keep the bed a little cooler. It does, but it also is supremely comfortable. Can't recommend it enough. That said, if your bed is exactly the softness you want, use caution - this changes the hardness of your bed a little - it's a couple inches of cushioning on top of your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress pad I have found on Amazon and elsewhere. Note that they last about two years, give or take a couple of months. Also, they're heavy and bulky so running them through the dryer to air out will not be easy. Overall, I highly recommend this mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this to add some life to an extremely old mattress on its last leg. This really did make a difference in how I woke up in the morning, less pain and better sleep. It’s cooling and very soft. I ended up replacing the mattress but I am still using this topper and still love it. Shipping was fast, customer service was wonderful. Do not regret this purchase at all. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a little extra comfort on their bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari H.
